title: doc: switch example in Effective Go is missing switch statement.
body:
In the document Effective Go, the code example for breaking to a label from inside a
switch statement is missing a switch statement and contains a syntax error.

http://golang.org/doc/effective_go.html#switch

The code snippet...

Loop:
	for n := 0; n < len(src); n += size {
		case src[n] < sizeOne:

...should read:

Loop:
	for n := 0; n < len(src); n += size {
		switch {
		case src[n] < sizeOne:
